_sText:
The third installment of the gg_rotadome series!
From gg_rotadome_v2: In the dome, there is a circular area in the center, divided by a wall. CT's spawn on one side, T's spawn on the other. On top of the wall sits a small snipers nest, with a ladder leading to it from both sides of the wall. A rotating 'conveyor belt' sort-of thing surrounds the spawn areas. The rotating platform is designed to travel from one spawn area to another, but can be used for drive-bys if you are inclined to do so.
gg_rotadome_v3 updates the previous maps in the series by adding various LDR lighting effects (all static, so don't worry about your FPS), a sunken rotating platform covered with water (44 units high), an open-roofed circular wall surrounding the play area, fixed ladder, increased player limit and more. This is a fun, fast-paced and innovative GunGame map that players will love.
